title: Budget Suites of America
map_address: 8440 S. Las Vegas Blvd near Wigwam/Windmill
posting_body: Starting at $359+taxes and a refundable deposit.
WE ARE OPEN COME CHECK US OUT!!
Studio and 1 Bedroom apartments fully furnished, Refrigerator, Oven, Microwave, Dishwasher, Garbage disposal, Flat Screen HDTV, Showtime & ESPN channels.
Free local phone calls including voicemail.
Flexible stay options with no leases or credit check.
Background check is required to provide you with a safe place to live.
Courtesy Patrol on site, 3 Laundry Rooms , 2 Swimming Pools - 2 Hot tubs.
Shopping Center right next door, Public Library & minutes away from Outlet Mall.
